response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its value to you, I propose a purchase price of $11,000. This offer allows us to share the benefits of this exceptional product while ensuring you receive it at a fair and reasonable cost. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
